descriptionKey:
[23c8f5]Hoth: an icy, desolate world in a remote system, and the site of a secret Rebel base. Crush the Rebel Alliance![-]

[ffcc33]Mission Bonuses: [-][23c8f5]Hoth Heroes, Empire (See Details)[-].

[23c8f5]TIP: [-][ffcc33ff]INVITE ALLIES[-][23c8f5] to join your Guild. Increasing Guild size is the fastest way to improve in Territory Battles.[-]

zoneDefinition.descriptionKey: A second wave of AT-ATs are being deployed. Send Platoons to re-establish a foothold.
Send troops ahead to scout the enemy fortifications while Imperial heavy assault vehicles are being deployed.
Destroy Rebel supply caches to weaken their defenses.
Advance forces here to gain access to the Outer Pass on the way to the Rebel Base (South Entrance)
Rebel squadrons have moved to intercept Imperial Capital Ships. Launch ships to engage!
Attack the Rebel controlled Ion Cannon to weaken it before Imperial ships press forward.
Rebel forces are protecting the passage through the mountains. Pierce their defenses.
The Rebel fighters are breaking -- press the advantage!
The Power Generator is the only thing protecting the Rebels from Orbital Bombardment -- destroy it at all costs!
The fighting has moved to the trenches -- take control of the battlefield from the Rebels.
The Rebels are attempting to stall our Imperial fleet movement in this area! Thwart their feeble endeavor.
Rebel forces are holding onto entrenchments as a last line of defense to protect the Rebel Base.
Take out the turrets in this sector to grant Imperial infantry access to the Rebel Base!
Several transport ships are launching to evactuate the Rebel Base. Quell the remaining Rebel ships!
Swiftly rout the Rebel Base and crush their remaining forces.
The Southern Entrance has been breached, overwhelm Rebel fortifications to seal Imperial victory.

reconZoneDefinitionList.rewardDescKey: Earn bonus TP for each Platoon completed.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey:
[23C8F5]Time Limit:[-] [ff8c00]6d[-]
[23C8F5]Phases: [b5e7f5]6[-]
[23C8F5]Roster Refresh:[-] [b5e7f5]After every Phase[-]

Exclusive Rewards (earned in Special Mission):
[23C8F5]All of your Empire characters gain the following ability:[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Empire characters gain: +10% Critical Chance, +10% Max Health, and +10% Lifesteal.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]All of your Hoth Hero Characters gain the following ability:[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Hoth Hero characters gain: The first time this unit uses a special ability each encounter, dispel all buffs on selected target.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]The Rebel Alliance utilizes a myriad of seasoned soldiers well-equipped for combat in Hoth's harsh icy environment. Be on the lookout for Elite units--not only are they much stronger than normal units, but they also have powerful Elite abilities![-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 40% chance to gain 25% Turn Meter for all allies.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance to Stun for 1 turn. In addition, gain 100% Turn Meter on a Critical Hit.
Hoth Rebel Scout gains 100% Turn Meter whenever an Empire enemy is defeated and half that amount whenever a non-Empire enemy is defeated.
When Hoth Rebel Scout uses any ability while Stealthed he calls a random ally to Assist.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to inflict Offense Down for 2 Turns. In addition, inflict Offense Down for 2 Turns on critical hit.
Taunt and grant Rebel allies Defense Up for 3 turns. In addition, Hoth Rebel Soldier gains 35% Health Up for 3 turns.

Hoth Rebel Soldier gains Defense Up for 2 turns when any character is defeated. At the start of his turn, if Hoth Rebel Soldier has Defense Up, he recovers 30% Max Health. Hoth Rebel Soldier has 70% Counter Chance.
When Hoth Rebel Soldier attacks, he Dazes target for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If the target is Empire, gain 25% Turn Meter.
Dispel all negative status effects from all allies. Each ally recovers 15% of their Max Health for each effect dispelled this way.
Recover 5% Protection when another ally is damaged.
Recover 5% Health and Turn Meter when another ally is damaged.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and a random ally gains Defense Up for 2 turns.
All allies recover 50% Health. [c][ffff33]All allies recover 100% Health. (Elite Only)[-][/c]
Rebel Officer gains foresight when another ally attacks.
When Rebel Officer attacks all allies gain 5% Turn Meter.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If Rebel Pilot is suffering any negative status effects, call an ally to assist.
Dispel all negative status effects from all allies. Each ally gains 5% Turn Meter for each effect dispelled this way.
When an ally is defeated, Rebel Pilot gains 100% Turn Meter.
Whenever an ally is defeated, reset the cooldowns of all allied abilities.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If Rebel Soldier is debuffed, inflict Health Down. This attack also has a 25% chance to give a random ally Tenacity Up.
Rebel Soldier gains Taunt and 40% Max Protection for 2 turns.
When Rebel Soldier receives a Critical Hit, he gains Defense Up for 2 turns.
When Rebel Soldier gains Taunt, he gains Retribution for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and, if Rebel Spy has Stealth, Stun them for 1 turn.
The 2 least healthy allies gain Stealth for 2 turns and Recover 40% Protection.
Rebel Spy starts each encounter Stealthed. Rebel Spy gains Stealth upon receiving a Critical Hit..
When an ally gains Stealth, Dispel all negative status effects on them.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]The following allied abilities and upgrades can be unlocked by completing Platoon Missions.[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey:
[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 75% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn. This ability starts on cooldown. In addition, this ability is disabled in territories protected by the [c][ffff33]Planetary Shield[-][/c] ability. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] +35% Damage. 

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] +30 Cooldown Speed.

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Deal bonus damage to target enemy equal to 40% of the target's Maximum Health. Inflict Healing Immunity to target with a 50% chance to inflict to other enemies. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] +50 Cooldown Speed. 

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] +45% bonus damage.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]The following abilities are available to enemy units, but can be weakened or disabled by completing Platoon Missions.[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey:
[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Deal Special damage to target enemy, remove 100% Turn Meter, and Stun them for 1 turn. This ability starts without cooldown. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] -30 Cooldown Speed. No longer reduces Turn Meter. 

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] -20 Cooldown Speed. This ability starts on cooldown. 

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (Ion Cannon Destroyed)

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] [c][ffff33]Planetary Shield[-][/c] ability is active in the [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (Main Entrance)[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (South Entrance)[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Forward Trenches[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Overlook[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Power Generator[-][/c], and [c][F0FF23]Rear Trenches[-][/c] territories. Orbital Bombardment is disabled. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] [c][ffff33]Planetary Shield[-][/c] ability is active in the [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (Main Entrance)[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (South Entrance)[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Forward Trenches[-][/c], and [c][F0FF23]Overlook[-][/c] territories. Orbital Bombardment is enabled on the [c][F0FF23]Power Generator[-][/c] and [c][F0FF23]Rear Trenches[-][/c]. 

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] [c][ffff33]Planetary Shield[-][/c] ability is active in the [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (Main Entrance)[-][/c] and [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (South Entrance)[-][/c] territories. Orbital Bombardment is enabled on the [c][F0FF23]Forward Trenches[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Overlook[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Power Generator[-][/c], and [c][F0FF23]Rear Trenches[-][/c]. 

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c]  Planetary Shield ability is inactive in all territories. Orbital Bombardment is enabled on the [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (Main Entrance)[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Rebel Base (South Entrance)[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Forward Trenches[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Overlook[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Power Generator[-][/c], and [c][F0FF23]Rear Trenches[-][/c] territories.

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Deal bonus damage to all enemies equal to 60% of their Maximum Health, Dispel all buffs on them, and remove 30% Turn Meter. In addition, inflict Defense Down on target enemy for 3 turns. This ability starts on cooldown. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] -30 Cooldown Speed. 

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] -20% bonus damage. 

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (Rebel Strafing Run Destroyed)

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] All enemies have +50% Defense and +10% Critical Avoidance. In addition, they recover 20% Health at the start of their turn with a 60% chance to Dispel all debuffs from themselves. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] -20% Health recovery per turn and -20% Dispel chance. 

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] -25% Defense and -10% Critical Avoidance. 

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (Supply Lines Destroyed)

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] All enemies have +10% Critical Chance and a 25% chance to gain Advantage at the start of each Encounter. In addition, each ally's first successful attack each encounter has a 35% chance to also Daze the target for 2 turns. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] Remove 35% chance to Daze target with first attack each encounter. 

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Remove 25% chance to gain Advantage at start of encounter. 

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (Rebel Guerrilla Strike Destroyed)

localNotificationsList.messageKey: A Territory Battle has just started!
